titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J.Res. 38) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2009, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J.Res. 38) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2009, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-25, by Mr. McGovern.
All points of order against consideration of the joint resolution are waived except those arising under clause 10 or rule XXI.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 16.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 235, H. Res. 219 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J.Res. 38) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2009.
